messages.content: write a long sentence and reverse all chars

gnitirw siht hguorht gnivreser yb ,srettel gnidnatsrednu dna gniod si ssiht taht etartsnomed siht ni gnitneserp fo gnitirw eht ,gnitirw gnol a si sihT

Reversed: This is a long writing, the writing of presenting this demonstrated art that is doing and understanding letters, by reversing through this writing.
write a long sentence first,  and then reverse all chars

This is a long sentence, created to demonstrate the intricate art of reversing characters within a sentence, showcasing the unique transformation it undergoes.

Reversed: .seogrednu ti noitamrofsnart euqinu eht gniwahcsoc ,secnetnes a nihtiwni sretcarahc gnitneserp fo tra etaorlecni eht etartsnomed ot ,ecnetnes gnol a si sihT
